doOneHook() doOneHookPlugin PlugindoOneHook
static doOneHook ( $plugin_key, $hook, $args)[static]
This function executes a hook for 1 plugin.
Paramètres
string$plugin_key
System name of the plugin
string | callable$hook
suffix used to build function to be called ("plugin_myplugin_{$hook}") or callable function
mixed
...$args [optional] One or more arguments passed to hook function
Renvoie
mixed $data

Documentation des champs
$rightname $rightnamePlugin Plugin$rightname
$rightname = 'config'[static]
ACTIVATED ACTIVATEDPlugin PluginACTIVATED
const ACTIVATED = 1
ANEW ANEWPlugin PluginANEW
const ANEW = 0
NOTACTIVATED NOTACTIVATEDPlugin PluginNOTACTIVATED
const NOTACTIVATED = 4
NOTINSTALLED NOTINSTALLEDPlugin PluginNOTINSTALLED
const NOTINSTALLED = 2
NOTUPDATED NOTUPDATEDPlugin PluginNOTUPDATED
const NOTUPDATED = 6
OPTION_AUTOINSTALL_DISABLED OPTION_AUTOINSTALL_DISABLEDPlugin PluginOPTION_AUTOINSTALL_DISABLED
const OPTION_AUTOINSTALL_DISABLED = 'autoinstall_disabled'
REPLACED REPLACEDPlugin PluginREPLACED
const REPLACED = 7
The plugin has been replaced by another one.
TOBECLEANED TOBECLEANEDPlugin PluginTOBECLEANED
const TOBECLEANED = 5
TOBECONFIGURED TOBECONFIGUREDPlugin PluginTOBECONFIGURED
const TOBECONFIGURED = 3
UNKNOWN UNKNOWNPlugin PluginUNKNOWN
const UNKNOWN = -1
La documentation de cette classe a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/src/Plugin.php
